Bauder | AP]]></dc:creator><description><![CDATA[In a room lined with computer terminals buzzing all night during the Olympics, an intern raises a hand. It's a celebration of black excellence]]></title> <link>https://www.washingtonpost.com/video/entertainment/black-panther-is-more-than-a-trip-to-the-movies-its-a-celebration-of-black-excellence/2018/02/16/e59b11de-133c-11e8-a68c-e9374188170e_video.html</link> <dc:creator><![CDATA[Adrian Higgins]]></dc:creator><description><![CDATA[Rushing to the theater to see Marvel's "Black Panther" is more than just a weekend activity. Many fans are using the movie to celebrate a shift toward a more positive, empowering portrayal of people from the continent of Africa.]]></description><media:thumbnail url="https://www.washingtonpost.com/rf/image_606w/2010-2019/WashingtonPost/2018/02/16/Style/Videos/Images/201802/t_1518805897439_name_BlackPanther_V2_scaled.jpg?t=20170517" width="606"/> <media:group>
